attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just how low will broadcasters stoop in the name of entertainment? 

If broadcasters are unable to demonstrate  any form of moral code or control their  appetite for the worst that human kind has to offer then the  government should apply  limits to the depth of depravity and the frequency with which these programmes appear on television.  Even comedy show highlights  portray characters waving guns and laughing as if this the norm.

Surely our broadcasters should be uplifting those whom they serve not reducing all to the lowest common denominator.

If you aspire to raising the standard of Television programmes please submit your support to this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
